title: Loyd & Boyd and The Slug Monster of Webster County
description: Children's author, R. Lewis McGhee, weaves a mesmerizing yarn about the adventures of twin brothers, Loyd and Boyd, and an ancient Indian legend, set in early twentieth century south Georgia. After living with their father in New York City for some time, Loyd and Boyd travel to visit kinfolk in Ty Ty, Georgia. The trip, however, isn t all fun and games for the twins. Loyd and Boyd get wind of a harrowing monster lurking within the dark backwoods of Webster County, and they set out to bring it back to New York City Museum for big money and fame. Is the legend fact or fantasy? Will the boys survive the encounter in the woods, the armed posse, the group of girls determined to thwart their plans, and an annoying little pest named Dibbs? Follow the Loyd and Boyd on an amazing journey that stirs the mind's imagination and fills the heart with courage.
author: R. Lewis McGhee
